name: A. The Brand New Function
statement:
Polycarpus has a sequence, consisting of non-negative integers: .Let’s
define function ( are integer, ) for sequence as an operation of bitwise
OR of all the sequence elements with indexes from to . Formally: .
Polycarpus took a piece of paper and wrote out the values of function
for all ( are integer, ). Now he wants to know, how many values he’s got
in the end. Help Polycarpus, count the number of distinct values of
function for the given sequence .Expression means applying the operation
of bitwise OR to numbers and . This operation exists in all modern
programming languages, for example, in language and it is marked as "",
in as "".
